title: Seminars & Consultations
subtitle: Our expert staff will provide detailed explanations about buying and selling apps and web services

recommendedFor.title: Recommended For
items: Considering selling your app or service
Want to understand fees and transaction flow
Just want to hear about the service casually

content.title: Seminar Content
items: Selling and buying process and timeline

recommendedFor.title: Recommended For
items: Get an estimate of selling price

items.question: Q. Are seminars and consultations really free?
items.answer: Yes, they are completely free. There is no charge for attending seminars or consultations. Fees only apply upon successful transaction completion if you decide to list or purchase.

items.question: Q. What do I need to participate?
items.answer: For online sessions, you need an internet connection and a device capable of using video calling tools like Zoom or Google Meet. You may be asked to complete a brief questionnaire in advance.

items.question: Q. Can I participate without a specific project?
items.answer: Absolutely. Feel free to join even if you're just considering selling in the future or simply gathering information.

items.question: Q. Will my consultation content be kept confidential?
items.answer: Yes, all consultation content is strictly managed and will not be disclosed to third parties. We can also sign an NDA (Non-Disclosure Agreement) if needed.

items.question: Q. Can I cancel my reservation?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel your reservation. We would appreciate notification by the day before.

items.question: Q. Are weekends and holidays available?
items.answer: Generally we only operate on weekdays, but if you have special circumstances requiring weekend or holiday consultation, please contact us individually. We will do our best to accommodate your schedule.

steps.title: Apply
steps.description: Select your preferred date and time from the form

steps.title: Schedule Confirmation
steps.description: Our staff will contact you to confirm the schedule

steps.title: Preparation
